features: 【Professional Guard】Q18 indoor security camera is a professional home security guard, always protect your family, belongings or valuable documents. It is equipped with AI human detection, once it senses an abnormality in the surveillance screen, it will send an alert to your mobile app and start recording immediately. All the videos will be saved in your memory card and cloud space, you can replay them anytime.

【Couldn't be smaller】The Q18 WiFi camera is super mini with a diameter of just 1.1'', so you can hide it anywhere and use its 160-degree wide angle lens to help you monitor the images you want to see without worrying about being noticed. It comes with a nice mounting bracket for easy installation, so you don't have to drill holes or run wires.

【Long-lasting work】With industry-leading low power consumption technology and the 1800 mAh built-in battery,which supports it can provide 6 hours of continuous recording and nearly 100 days of standby time. You can charge it, plug it in directly or use power bank to keep it working for a long time. The advanced remote on/off function allows you to freely control the working time of the device rather than just remote viewing..

【Intelligent Auto Night Vision】The nanny camera is equipped with a sensitive light sensor that can quickly detect changes in light and switch automatically, and the powerful night vision function helps you record clear images even in the dark of night. 4K UHD camera and 6 non-illuminated IR night vision lights won't let you miss any important moments.
【Security without worries】You need a reliable camera to improve your home security level and help watch your children, elderly, pets, cars, jewelry, documents, C18 is the best choice for you.
body.description: The biggest advantage of the Q18 is 5 megapixels, with a resolution of up to 2560X1440 Ultra HD 4K, better results. Built-in 1800mAc dual lithium battery, working time of more than 5 hours, standby time of more than 1 year. 8 straw hat 940nm infrared light, automatic switching night vision, no red dot, better night vision, support voice real-time intercom, 160 degrees wide angle lens, whether in the indoor / outdoor can be used. Support 128G memory card, do not worry about the memory problem.
